Serene Living in the Heart of Green Valley
This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1253 Sq.
Ft.
Come home to comfort, convenience and tranquility at 3001 Park Apartments, ideally located in desirable Henderson, NV.
This gated community in the Green Valley neighborhood has a lush garden setting that provides easy access to all areas of the Las Vegas Valley.
The friendly residents enjoy a wide range of perks and upgrades to live the resort-style life they desire.
Each spacious floor plan offers open living spaces and an abundance of storage space, as well as an in-home washer and dryer set.
Soak up the sun from your home’s expansive patio or balcony.
Venture into the contemporary and stylishly appointed clubhouse to entertain guests or meet your neighbors.
Lounge beside one of the three refreshing swimming pools, surrounded by lavish tropical landscaping.
When you find your next home at 3001 Park, comfort and convenience are all yours.
Pet Policy
We welcome 2 pets per apartments home.
There is a $350 non-refundable pet fee, per pet.
Pet rent is $35 per pet per month.
The weight limit is 75 lbs per pet and aggressive breeds are prohibited.
Please contact our leasing office for more information about our pet policy.
Office Hours:
Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM
Saturday-Sunday:10:00AM-5:00PM
